about_the_game:
Data that enables new officers for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV".
Note: Officer data added by this DLC cannot be edited.

As a collaboration with the anime "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" and "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These" that are based on Yoshiki Tanaka's renowned Sci-fi novel, the Galactic Empire's Reinhard and the Free Planets Alliance's Yang are added.
Reinhard was hailed as the "invincible hero" and "genius of war", while Yang was known as "Yang the Magician" and "Miracle Yang".

▼Added characters
Reinhard, Yang

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.
